rotate_lever_slot.description: Rotate the lever in a slot movement

clean_and_check_lever.description: Wipe the lever then check its status.

wipe_lever_then_rotate.description: Clean the lever using a cloth or wipe, then perform a rotation.

rotate_lever_back_and_forth.description: Rotate the lever back and forth for a specified number of times.

wipe_and_rotate_lever.description: First clean the lever using a cloth or wipe, then perform a rotation.

check_lever_status.description: Check the status of lever to ensure its proper functionality

clean_lever.description: Clean the lever to maintain hygiene

rotate_lever.description: Rotate the lever to a specified degree.

wipe_lever.description: Wipe the lever to ensure cleanliness.

clean_and_rotate_lever.description: Clean the lever to ensure cleanliness, then rotate the lever to aid in flushing.

clean_and_press_lid.description: Clean the pump lid and then press it.

wipe_pump_lid_then_press.description: Clean the pump lid with a cloth or wipe, then press it.

press_and_release_pump_lid.description: Press and release the pump lid anticlockwise to the desired position, typically to close or open the valve.

wipe_and_press_pump_lid.description: First clean the pump_lid with a cloth or wipe, then press it.

check_pump_lid_status.description: Check the pump lid status. Since it has no status assigned, it should be either in open or closed status.

clean_pump_lid.description: Clean the pump lid to maintain cleanliness

press_pump_lid.description: Press the pump lid anticlockwise to the desired position, typically to close or open the valve.

wipe_pump_lid.description: Clean the pump lid to remove dirt and debris.

clean_and_press_pump_lid.description: First clean the pump lid, then press down on the lid.

wipe_toilet_interior.description: Clean the interior of the toilet by wiping it.

wipe_toilet_exterior.description: Clean the outside of the toilet by wiping it.

clean_body_twice.description: Clean the toilet body twice for thorough cleaning.

deep_clean_toilet_body.description: Wipe the toilet body twice to ensure a deep clean.

clean_toilet_body.description: Clean the toilet body to maintain cleanliness and hygiene

wipe_toilet_body.description: Clean the toilet body to ensure hygiene and cleanliness.

clean_toilet_body_twice.description: Clean the toilet body twice to ensure a deep clean.

full_cleaning.description: Clean all parts of the toilet by wiping lever, pump, and body of the toilet.

use_and_clean.description: Simulate toilet usage, press pump lid and rotate lever and then clean all parts.

clean_every_part.description: Clean every part of the toilet including the lever, pump lid, and toilet body.

simulate_usage_and_clean.description: Simulate full toilet usage by pressing pump lid, rotating lever and clean all parts.

clean_toilet_complete.description: Clean all parts of the toilet by wiping lever, pump lid, and toilet body.

full_toilet_usage.description: Simulate full toilet usage by pressing pump lid, rotating lever and clean all parts.

clean_all.description: Clean the entire toilet including lever, pump lid, and toilet body

check_all_components.description: Check all components of the toilet (lever, pump lid, toilet body) for any defects.

clean_whole_toilet.description: Clean the whole toilet including lever, pump lid, and toilet body.

clean_toilet.description: Clean all parts of the toilet including lever, pump lid, and toilet Body.

use_toilet.description: Perform regular toilet use by rotating lever, pressing pump lid, and then cleaning all parts.

maintain_toilet.description: Maintenance involves checking all components and cleaning the entire toilet.

perform_routine_check.description: Routine check involves checking all components for any defects.
